title: Ideas for the League of Legends Merchandise Store
body:
Hey guys, I contacted Riot Support for this and they suggested me to see how much 'attention' I would get from saying what I originally wanted to, but I decided to try start a thread of **what us players would like to see in the League of Legends Merchandise Store** which has been talked about on Surr@20.
So, the League of Legends Merchandise Store is quite self explanatory, a store of League of Legends Merchandise.

So, my original thought I handed to Riot Support was that Riot could try to 'make' Gunpla-like sets for the more mechanical themed skins such as:
Mecha Kha'Zix (or anything else in the Mecha Series)
Full Metal Jayce (or anything else in the Full Metal Series)
Battlecast Prime Cho'Gath (or anything else in the Battlecast Series)

So what is "*Gunpla*"?
Gunpla is basically the Japanese toy/model sets of Gundam robots from the anime *Gundam*. I honestly think having toy/model build-able sets like these in League of Legends would be absolutely amazing, since the models tend to be higher quality than just some immovable figurines which Riot are planning to sell anyway.

Anyway, I've attached a few pictures of what 'Gunpla' is in the links section and I honestly reckon that the most high priority skin goes to Mecha Kha'Zix. Just imagine a Mecha Kha'Zix model/toy in the 'fashion' of the Gunpla sets. Amazing.


I don't know how the heck to use links and attachments correctly but here are the other links I was supposed to add. Not sure why it just posts a huge link and I can't delete it but oh well.

List down who you think I may have missed!
Blitzcrank could have a suction cup as a hand and a button you push to project the hand to grab something, like a bottle...

> Blitzcrank could have a suction cup as a hand and a button you push to project the hand to grab something, like a bottle...

Maybe have a spring which fires out his hand (with a ‘wire-like’ rope)?
Could do.

Plus, Mecha Kha’Zix could have add-ons for his stages of evolutions…but I’m out of ideas for if he evolves his ultimate :\

Full Metal Jayce’s hammer would be able to ‘shift’ into a cannon form, thats not too hard..

Any other *mechanics*?
Also, lets just ignore the costs of making/designing these for now.
